sen.j: 渡辺 登綱（わたなべ のりつな、元禄7年（1694年）- 明和4年10月21日 (旧暦)（1767年12月11日））は、和泉国伯太藩の第2代藩主。
sen.e: Noritsuna WATANABE (1694 - Dec. 11, 1767) was the second lord of Hakata Domain, Izumi Province.
Noritsuna WATANABE (1694 - Dec. 11, 1767) was the second lord of Hakata Domain, Izumi Province.
Noritsuna WATANABE (1694 - Dec. 11, 1767) was the second lord of Hakata Domain, Izumi Province.
4th head of Watanabe family of Hakata Domain
The fourth head of Watanabe family of Hakata Domain
The fourth head of Watanabe family of Hakata Domain

sen.j: 初代藩主・渡辺基綱の長男。
sen.e: Eldest son of Mototsuna WATANABE, first domain lord
Eldest son of Mototsuna WATANABE, the first domain lord
Eldest son of Mototsuna WATANABE, the first domain lord
His mother was a daughter of Katatsuna WATANABE.
His mother was a daughter of Katatsuna WATANABE.
His mother was a daughter of Katatsuna WATANABE.

sen.j: 正室は松平定陳の長女、継室は松平定陳の次女。
sen.e: His lawful wife was the eldest daughter of Sadanobu MATSUDAIRA, and his second wife was a second daughter of Sadanobu MATSUDAIRA.
His lawful wife was the eldest daughter of Sadanobu MATSUDAIRA, and his second wife was a second daughter of Sadanobu MATSUDAIRA.
His lawful wife was the eldest daughter of Sadanobu MATSUDAIRA, and his second wife was a second daughter of Sadanobu MATSUDAIRA.

sen.j: 子は渡辺充綱（長男）、渡辺信綱（次男）、渡辺朝綱（四男）。
sen.e: His children includes Michitsuna WATANABE (eldest son), Nobutsuna WATANABE (second son), and Tomotsuna WATANABE (4th son).
His children include Michitsuna WATANABE (eldest son), Nobutsuna WATANABE (second son), and Tomotsuna WATANABE (fourth son).
His children include Michitsuna WATANABE (eldest son), Nobutsuna WATANABE (second son), and Tomotsuna WATANABE (fourth son).
His court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
His court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
His court rank was Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
He was appointed as Governor of Tango Province
He was appointed as Governor of Tango Province
He was appointed as Governor of Tango Province
and Governor of Etchu Province.
and Governor of Etchu Province.
and Governor of Etchu Province.

sen.j: 元禄7年（1694年）、野本にて生まれる。
sen.e: He was born at Nomoto in 1694.
He was born at Nomoto in 1694.
He was born at Nomoto in 1694.
His childhood name was Genjuro.
His childhood name was Genjuro.
His childhood name was Genjuro.

sen.j: 享保13年（1728年）、父の死去により後を継いだ。
sen.e: He inherited the head of the family upon the death of his father in 1728.
He inherited the head of the family upon the death of his father in 1728.
He inherited the head of the family upon the death of his father in 1728.

sen.j: 明和4年（1767年）9月10日、次男の信綱に家督を譲って隠居し、同年10月21日に74歳で死去した。
sen.e: He retired and transferred the head of the family to his second son Nobutsuna on Sept. 10, 1767, and died at the age of 74 on Oct. 21 in the same year.
He retired and transferred the head of the family to his second son Nobutsuna on October 2, 1767, and died at the age of 74 on December 11 in the same year.
He retired and transferred the head of the family to his second son Nobutsuna on October 2, 1767, and died at the age of 74 on December 11 in the same year.
